effect:
Pixilate causes all Normal-type attacking moves used by the Pokémon to become Fairy-type, and increase in power by 20%.
Fairy-type Pokémon also gain STAB from those moves (which means an effective increase of 80%).
In Generation 6, Pixilate increases affected moves' power by 30%.
description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
